overview_of_class: This class will engage two works, Brahms' Piano Quartet Op. 25 and Mahler's Kindentotenlieder, through analysis. Student work will emphasize daily analysis assignments and a final written project. Attendances is required at all class meetings, and therefore this class is not suitable for students who will be absent for more than one week. This class may be used the DM theory exam exemption except for students who have taken another class fulfilling the 19th century requirement.
name: Analytical Studies
title: MUSIC MUS_THRY 331-0-1 Analytical Studies
